critical_findings.description: KETTLER MANAGEMENT INC. is registered in Virginia but registration status is unknown or missing in 5 operational states (MD, DC, CT, NJ, NY). DC search explicitly shows 'registered: false'.
regulatory_implications: Failure to qualify as foreign entity can result in:
- Inability to sue in state courts
